attributes.action: Suspend party politics for the duration of any upcoming recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The events in European and American financial markets have become worse than anyone can imagine. It now appears to be at a stage whereby no amount of money will create stability.

We call upon the Prime Minister to create a coalition of the best available talents from all parties in the United Kingdom, to provide stability remove the potentially damaging party politics that get in the way of everybody's common aim, namely to survive the next few years in financial terms.
